# Push Event Workflows

## Triggers

- Push to main
- Push tags

## Workflows

### 1. Release Management

- Version bumping
- Changelog generation
- Release drafting

### 2. Publishing

- NPM publishing
- Deno publishing
- JSR publishing

### 3. Documentation

- Website deployment
- API docs generation
- Changelog updates

## Configuration Files

- `.github/workflows/publish.yml`
- `.github/workflows/release-drafter.yml`
- `.github/workflows/deploy.yml`
